0.1.name: wordpress/superslider-login
0.1.description:
Add some style to your site with this slide-in login-register-dashboard panel or multi-widget panel. Theme based, animated, automatic user detection, uses mootools 1.4.5 java script. This plugin is part of the SuperSlider series. Get more supersliders at supersliders

Features

  • dashboard links in the slidein panel
  • Load the slidein panel with widgets.
  • complete global control from options page
  • Control transition time, type.

Demos

This plugin can be seen in use here:

  • Demo 1
